text: The 55th Baeksang Arts Awards () ceremony was held on May 1, 2019 at COEX Convention & Exhibition Center in Seoul. One of South Korea's major awards shows, the annual awards ceremony recognizes excellence in film and television. It was hosted by Shin Dong-yup, Bae Suzy and Park Bo-gum. The highest honors of the night, Grand Prize (Daesang), were awarded to actor Jung Woo-sung of Innocent Witness in the film division and actress Kim Hye-ja of The Light in Your Eyes in the television division. ==Winners and nominees== Jung Woo-sung, Grand Prize (Film) Kim Hye-ja, Grand Prize (TV) Kang Hyeong- cheol, Best Director (Film) Lee Sung-min, Best Actor (Film) Han Ji-min, Best Actress (Film) Lee Byung-hun, Best Actor (TV) Yum Jung-ah, Best Actress (TV) Kim Joo-hyuk, Best Supporting Actor (Film) Kim Byung-chul, Best Supporting Actor (TV) Lee Jung-eun, Best Supporting Actress (TV) Kim Young-kwang, Best New Actor (Film) Lee Jae-in, Best New Actress (Film) Jang Ki-yong, Best New Actor (TV) Kim Hye-yoon, Best New Actress (TV) Jun Hyun-moo, Best Variety Performer – Male Lee Young-ja, Best Variety Performer – Female Nominees were announced on April 4, 2019. Below is the complete list of nominees and winners.
